channel.title: Weather at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL - via NOAA's National Weather Service
channel.description: Weather conditions from NOAA's National Weather Service.

item.title: Fair and Breezy and 81 F at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL
item.description: Winds are from the South at 20.7 gusting to 28.8 MPH (18 gusting to 25 KT). The pressure is 1013.4 mb and the humidity is 37%. The heat index is 80. Last Updated on May 7 2015, 3:52 pm CDT.
